channel.title: Welcome! on Maxi Redigonda's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome! on Maxi Redigonda's Website

item.title: Brazilian ICPC Summer School 2018
item.description: This is a two weeks long event, with theoretic lectures from outstanding instructors in the mornings, and competitive programming contests in the afternoons. It was held from January 22nd to February 3rd in the city of Campinas, São Paulo.

item.title: Diary
item.description: 2020 March Week 16 (Apr 13th - Apr 19th) 📷 Interview with VTEX about article 🙋 Helped with organization of virtual version of Argentina’s ICPC Training Camp 🍎 Started learning Physics Week 15 (Apr 6th - Apr 12th) 🔁 Switched from Vivaldi to Firefox, and from Zettlr + Visual Studio to Sublime Text 📑 Discovered and read many articles from HackerNews 🌊 Took a deep dive into the Go programming language 📈 Added Google Analytics to this blog 🎖 Passed to Google Code Jam Round 2 Week 14 (Mar 30th - Apr 5th) 🎥 Mocked interviews with friends 📺 Watched a video series on hugo static site generator 🏭 Deployed my own static website online (this website!
